We do not forgive, we do not forget. After all, none of us are as cruel as all of us.

dont really feel like doing anything.

People are ignoring me. Refusing to talk to me. am I that repulsive of a person? its not just one person either, it feels like easily half of the people I met after high school. When it rains it pours I guess. I just don't get why someone would do that...

I don't know why I'm posting on this journal. What do I hope to accomplish? a guilt trip? the only person who matters, wouldnt care, and besides that, is not someone I want to guilt trip anyway. 

I guess it just feels like, "matt, dont stop writing in this journal, we all still care about you" but then no one really does seem to care. not even the people who "make an effort" to contact me. Leaving me a message on aim everyday isnt the best way to do it. 

Am I just whinning for attention? I dunno, but some attention would be nice. THe trouble is, I'm not sure who I want it from. 

And its not like I want to be a bother! I just don't know what else to do...

well today looks to be pretty shitty. I have work today, and then the last dress rehearsal before friday's performance, but even teching isnt really going to cheer me up to much. Although, this whole ordeal has been stretched out over the past few nights, so its kinda like, at least now its over, I can move on, and I was somewhat prepared for it. 

But that fact of the matter is, I would say most of the people that read this journal, read it because of my relationship to Madeleine, and probably wouldnt really had we not been going out. I've always thought that this was kinda silly, but now I'm just considering doing away with live journal entirely. Why not? What do I keep track of in here? Anime conventions and shitty days. Lets face it, no one likes to read a friend's entry about how shitty there day was. Hell, most of you might have stopped reading by here, just because its shitty. So why should I bother talking about shitty days? As for anime conventions, I really dont think that I have the motivation anymore. Why should I? I work, I go to school, why should I have time for that stuff if I'm doing my life right?

So that being said, it seems that I might just be done with live journal, or at least this live journal username, as most everyone that reads it, no longer has any reason or moral obligation to.

matt out

I'm such a bad techie! I didnt even know this week was hell week! I can say that I havnt been around much because of my strep throat hitting me TWICE in 1 month, and I didnt want to get the singers sick, but still! I feel terrible that I havnt helped much.

Also, it has been brought to my attention that I am pretty lousy at more roles than just being a techie. The person who brought this to my attention knows who they are and knows what I mean, but it sucks for the rest of you who are reading my rant that I put here because typing it out makes me feel batter. Well fuck you guys, its not for you!

Ehem

What is it with people who can't make up their mind after so long? sure big decisions take time, but if you just cant make a decision about something important, then maybe you just dont care, and if you dont care, then say so! Don't fucking drag out the situation, just end it quick, or go with it, but choose one! flip a coin if thats what it takes to be decisive! But dont drag out other peoples time and energy and emotions because you dont care. if you prefer, you could say " because you are apathetic" if that makes it sound better to you, but it means the same thing.

2 hours until I turn 20.

IT'S SO TRIPPY

Strep again! wtf

grrr

on stronger meds, but i'm totally gonna miss some important classes.

Also, my birthday is thursday. 20 ans. O_o

The first five people to respond to this post will get some form of art, created by me, about them. I make no guarantees about quality or type.

The only catch, of course: as with most memes, if you sign up, you have to put this in your own journal as well.

I've just realized that since I am back at my parents house, I AM TOTALLY AT THE HOUSE WITH ALL MY YART STUFF!

*Ahem*

Thats right, all 3 of my different 18x24 sketchbooks and all my charcoal! This makes me happy because I've been meaning to do something bigger for a little while now. If I like it (whatever it will be) enough, maybe I'll take it up to SF with me and india ink it. 

myes... that is all!

oh, and the strep throat has been feeling much better.

really sick with sore throat.... anyone have a cure???

tea + honey = not working

I guess I've been pretty mopey and emo lately, but I guess that kinda thing happens. Especially when you have al these midterms, your job doesnt give you enough hours to pay for rent (let alone bills). grrr. I have all this stuff I need to pay for, and my job wont let me do that. I dunno, that and many other things, I just feel like theres too much going on in my life.

grrr. It really irks me when you have plans to see someone you really miss and then they bail on you for whatever reason, but when its because noone else wants to hang out, thats even more annoying! Connor Even if its just because they were tired also, but it still sucks to have someone get your hopes up and then let you down. *Sigh* Especially when you never get to see the person because they are always busy.

Typing this post on my new laptop! ^______^

This makes me happy. I installed (in order) AIM, Itunes, and Warcraft. 

Not much else to say, SG1 ended on a cliffhanger. =/

what else...
Nothing I guess.

See you later!

I don't like the new look and feel of Livejournal. they re-did their UI and now it feels and looks all funky.
Same thing happened with You tube and Deviant art. It kinda irks me. With deviant art and You tube I acquiesced (learned that word for penny-arcade =P ) but live journal is just ugly now.

This isnt so much an entry for any of you readers as much as it is for me to have somehting to do right now. And I kinda feel like complaining. 

Its cold in SF.
The kids at school are all idiots.
I'm broke.
My hat needs replacing.
Warcraft is boring but I still play it all the time.
Friends are leaving for collage and I didnt get to spend much time with them because of my shitty job.
My job is shitty.
There is almost no information about the race I want to play in Barry's Exalted game.
I feel like I hardly ever get to see Mad anymore but I doubt she feels the same way because I have been known to be clingy.
I'm broke.
My head has been hurting alot lately.
The only fun things to do in the City involve spending lots of money.
There is nothing yummy to eat here.
I can't draw to save my life.
I forgot I had an essay due tomorrow and I get to do that now.

Jenifer Government/Calvin Government

But I think Calvin might be gay...

T_T
out of ten people, I did 19.68% of the damage! Thats alot! ALOT! it probably doesnt mean much to you guys, but I'm very proud.
Yeap! Its true, I gots me a new look and feel for my journal.
Got in a car crash. Damage wasnt that bad, but still. Completely my fault. uhg!

I hate the feeling sometimes when something happens, but then doesn't get resolved. It is very irritating. I always wonder, what if, what next, those kinds of things. I am of course thinking of something specific. Snow crash. What happens next? And right when I think there is a sequel, nope, my dreams are ripped from me. Some times that all for the best though. I mean, at least its just a book. some times you don't get closure on things that happen in real life, and then you can just feel terrible. 

But fortunately for me, snow crash is very much fiction. And fiction is good, it's the only drama I really enjoy having in my life. =P

My weekend started at 11:00 on friday. Got out of a very over crowded class and headed to the bart stop that would take me along the path I needed to travel in order to get home to my family. 

Little did I know at the time, I hate my family.

Long story short, my parents and brother over react to everything, and the rest of my family (uncles and aunts) are just waspy jerks. It was the last time I get guilt tripped into going to a family get together. 

But yesterday, after getting home to the city, I got to hang out with Mad, and everything was better. We just lazed about and I don't remember the last time I felt so blissful. It was really nice ^_^

Starwars is postponed until further notice.
I will be gone this weekend till I don't know when.

I found an easter egg!

If you just go to random objections, I guess you find random stuff

http://objection.mrdictionary.net/go.php?n=744349

I just threw a watermelon off my roof. 13 floors.

Fuck yes.

I think it landed on a glass bottle, because it sounded more like shattering than squishing. the carnage, at first, seemed minimal, until I looked at my neighbor's walls, for there were the remains of the black seeded menace. The air outside my window smells very sweet right now. oh god, I hope it doesn't go rancid. This is the result of me not having enough to do during the day. 

I miss Tyler and Adam. Laura Innes and I were talking about it this weekend, and we both feel relatively useless compared to Tyler (and Adam for me because Laura doesn't know him).

=/

That watermelon was fun though.
Elaine: I'm atheist really. Well, I'm really just agnostic, but I'm getting more bitter...

As odd as it sounds, This was prompted by a USA television commercial. The commercial features 3 detectives, The guys from the new show Psych, the guy from the show The Dead Zone, and Monk. The first two are talking about how they envy each other, Psych says something along the lines of, I am jealous of you Dead Zone, you can just touch stuff and see things, a real psychic! Dead Zone: Yeah but you have a photographic memory, thats so cool! Psych: but that took years of training! Dead Zone: I only got my powers from being in a coma for years! Psych; I have a lousy father! The camera pans over to Monk in the next booth lining up his corn (off the cob) into neat rows and counting to 100. The Dead Zone and Psych guys decide that things could be worse. The commercial ends with the tag line for the station: USA, characters welcome.

At my very first gaming convention, Sam, Adam, and I were in a game called Shambles or some such thing. We were zombies, and had to conceal it. To describe my character, I had lime green bowling shoes, a checker tie, and some kind of nice shirt. This is where the creativity ends. I was in Marching band, had a thing for a girl named Shelly, and had allergies (all of this perfectly described my life in high school at one point or another). At this point Sam blurts out "You just described you!" I never felt so embarrased in my life, here I was, in a Zombie RP! Looking the fool! I should have been on the top of my game, but I really wasn't. My Character sucked. 

I tried to make a interesting cleric in the D&D game I'm in, but the idea of roleplaying Dick Dauntless was to great to pass up. The twist for my character is that he is a wimp one day, and Dick Dauntless the next. Every time he falls asleep he changes to the other person. 

The challenge: Make a better character out of Dick, despite the fact that I have already made it far to complicated and unimaginative. 

I need to find a way to create better characters. Maybe if my Star Wars D20 kicks off well, I can work on my characters with my NPCs.

Who knows, if I can make ConQuest, maybe I can avenge myself.

Um, I would just like to point out to everyone how lucky I am to have a girl who I never bicker with, who I love and who loves me, who is extremly beautiful, and who likes to share wonderful things with me. I love Madeleine more that anything, and I am the luckiest perosn in the world to have her.

Speaking of things Mad shares with me, Host Club! Everyone should watch it! It is the funniest anime ever excluding love hina and Excel Saga.

So happy 4th of July to everyone, especially to my military friends, thanks for defending our freedom, we all love you for it.

I'm in a fantastic mood right now, and I can't wait untill later today when my family and I will be eating Johnsonvile Brats and drinking either soda or rum and coke, depending on how generous my parents feel. Whats funny is, I look forward to the Brats more than the booze. Wierd that way I guess ^_^;

Well, despite not having said much (and I know I should post more to give Tyler something to read) I will end it hear, its kinda late, and I want to get in another episode of host club before I hit the sack. I'm not gonna bother spell checking, so please bear with.

---Apollo

Man,  great show. I'm glad I saw the end, and I even understood what was going on (which, granted how little of that show I've seen is pretty cool). The person who "spoiled it" for me was a liar after all! Fuck her! Well, certain things were true, but not who did certain things. I don't want to spoil it for anyone who might care, but the spoiler I was told made Julia seem like a cold hearted jerk, when really no one was. I think that both Spike and Vicious showed alot of class. You always get this vibe that they hate each other, and that might be true, but I think they also loved each other. Or at any rate had some deep lasting camaraderie that saw through every situation they were placed in. Especially at the end where they gave each other back their weapons! What style, what trust, even among men who wanted each other dead.
I'm starting a Starwars D20 game. Anyone in california want in (Tyler you are SOL T_T)?
I just saw the last episode of eva. now I know where the idea for Angelic days came from. Over all, it was a disapointing ending. I can see why the movie was made.

I need to make sure that the people I hang out actually hang out with me. Three times in less than a week, I have had plans to hang out with people, and then after I've waited forever for the call saying hey lets get together, I get instead a call saying whoops, forgot about you or sorry, didnt have time for you. I'm getting kinda sick of it. I feel like I'm not being treated that well. This isn't just one person either, and thats what is so annoying about it. 

Grr. I've talked to other people about this and they said that they would just break ties with people who do that kind of thing. Well, I'm not like that. Maybe I'm a glutton for abuse, but I prefere to hold on to my good friends, I just wish that my good friends felt the same way.

SO its 4 AM, I dont know how I stayed up this late, but I've decided to not go to bed tonight
If I go to bed, I won't wake up in time to go to work as early as I want, so what I will do is eat breakfast after this post, and hopefully around 5 30 be awake enough to take a shower, though that might wake up teh rooom mate. after shower I will make more breakfast and then do dishes. After that I will go make my bed, and put my laundrey away, infact, I will do that before the shower. if it seems like I'm rambling, I am, I have nothing to do. by the time I'm all done with that, it should be late enough to leave for work. Or I could just go to bed.

Today I went out for coffee with my two best friends Adam and Patty. It was very bitter sweet. We normally completely enjoy each others company and the time we spend together is always memorable. But today was slightly different. We still went out for coffee, had fun at a nearby park, but at the end when I would normally tell Adam, see you soon, and give Patty a ride home only to call her some name in jest and flash my highbeems at her as shes walking home, I gave them both a hug, told Adam to try to stay alive in the army, and told Patty to keep her chin up and enjoy herself in Arizona. 

I knew this day was coming, I knew that I would have to deal with the thought of never seeing either of them again. I always wondered what I would do in that situation, and now I guess I know. In highschool I always knew that certain days would eventually arrive, but I never really thought about them. I thought that I would probably be dead before I finished high school. But then I graduated. That was easy enough to deal with. When Madeleine and I got together, I knew she would be moving to SF, so I waited till I had roommates available and I moved up there too. One day in the next few years, I'll be moving again, where depends on who I am friends with and so on.  In the mean time though, I knew that Adam and Patty would be moving on from sunnyvale, but the fact that they are gone is really surreal. It definitely hit me with Adam a while ago.  I knew that I would be sad to see him go, but I felt that sadness over a long period of time. With Patty it didn't hit me until I gave her a hug goodbye and she said "I don't want to leave." 

I don't know where I'm going.

I found another white hair! this is the 3rd one this week. Its just kinda... I'm not really sure what. Not scary, it just makes me uneasy. I dont want to be like Holden! Though, I have been pretty stressed out recently. *shrug* what can you do?

It seemed fun!

Explain your livejournal name and its meaning. When you're done, tag as many people as there are letters in your name.

ApolloMante is a combination of two different gaming handles I use. 
Mante (think of it like Montei if you were to use japanese pronunciation) was the second WOW character I made. He was an undead warrior, and I was trying to think of a name. With undead comes (at somepoint) the idea to make a dante's inferno reference. So I chose the name dante, but with an M for Matt instead of the D.

Apollo is from a screen name Apollo Control. I got the idea when listening to a song on Stark Raving Mad. the song was called Apollo Vibe. 

Apollo is my nickname for my self.
Mante is the name I give at restaurants and fast food joints.

I dont have that many friends, so everyone gets tagged!

This seemed fun, I'll tag people! Mad, Jan, Tyler!
